item.title: Fix 'Please wait while the document is being preared for' message in Adobe Reader
item.description: Any business user is familiar with the odd-ball errors that Adobe Reader can throw you while working. In this quick knowledgebase article, I’ll outline a quick fix I’ve found that works for me.

item.title: Fix mapped drives not showing in Open and Save dialogues in Windows
item.description: Problem User’s mapped drives do not show up as mapped in application Open/Save prompts, even though they show correctly in File Explorer > This PC.

item.title: Password and why you should be using one
item.description: Let me ask you some questions: Do you have that one account that you only have to log into once in a blue moon, and you pretty much always have to reset the password?

item.title: powershell_remove_net_printer_for_all_users
item.description: Purpose This brief article details the commands necessary to use PowerShell to remove a network printer for all users of a computer.

item.title: Review: Samsung Galaxy Tab S6
item.description: [!info] August 2020 Update I had to come back to update this post after having used the Samsung Galaxy Tab S6 for a longer period of time, as well as having traveled with it.

item.title: Signal - What this app is and why we should use it
item.description: You may have heard of Signal, or seen the Signal icon in your phone’s respective App Store. But what is it?
